org.apache.struts.tiles2.util

Class PlugInConfigContextAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.tiles2.util.PlugInConfigContextAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServletContext

    public class PlugInConfigContextAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServletContext
    Adapts a PlugInConfig object to become a ServletContext object, exposing init parameters methods.
